Caption: Figure 1. Experimental setup. The participant sat on the left            and the experimenter sat on the right.
Mention:
The experiment was carried out on a Microsoft Surface 1.0 
device running custom experimental software. The partici-
pant and the experimenter sat on opposite short ends of the 
surface (see Figure 1). The visible interface on the table 
was divided into two main areas (see Figure 2): the partici-
pant area (B—85% of the display area), and the experi-
menter area (A—15% of the display area). The experiment-
er’s area was occluded from the participant’s line of sight 
by a small wooden vertical screen (see Figure 1).
